title: 3bedroom luxury apartment for sale at empire
details:
This luxury apartment is located in Colombo 2, at Empire .

Common Hall, Dining Room, Powder Room & Balcony
Master Bedroom with walk in closet & attached toilet
3 Bedrooms / 2 Toilets
Maids living room is the access to a private outside balcony area Room with attached Toilet,
Separate Kitchen
floor area 2,028 Sq Feet
2 Dedicated car parks
Fully Furnished apartment
magnificent views of the city
Following Electronics that will be given along with the Apartment
50” LCD TV
Dialog TV Decoder
Fitted Oven
Fitted Cooker with Exhaust on top
Dish Washer ,Washing Machine,Refrigerator ,Microwave

Access to the squash courts, clubhouse, gym, swimming pool and children’s pool.

further information please call -0777-362600 / 0777-878138
